blog.name: reddragon1995
blog.title: Jonerys Snowstorm Of House Stargaryen
blog.description: HE LOVED HER AND SHE LOVED HIM

body:
Targaryen Babies

Seriously I want Jon and Daenerys to have like 7 Targ babies. And I think once it’s confirmed she is fertile, they totally will, because he won’t be able to keep his sperm from her eggs. (That means they will fuck a lot, kids.)

They are horny for each other and will be until her ovaries shrivel and he has Pycelle balls. And who knows, it may keep going after that! The fun of sex when you know ain’t no unplanned babies coming as a result is undeniable!

Long may they fornicate!

A wee disclaimer: I’m by tryna be insensitive to those with fertility issues. All in good fun, folks!

blog.name: stormcloudrising
blog.title: Storm Cloud Rising
blog.description: Theories and analysis of my favorite shows, books, life and anything of interest

summary: Grey Ghost: Jon and Sansa book Clues
title: Grey Ghost: Jon and Sansa book Clues
body:
I’ve been digging deeper into my theory that Sansa with her Tully fish background along with associations with rivers and the Blackwater is the symbolic golden dragon of the story and I came across a very interesting excerpt from The Princess and the Queen. It doesn’t have anything to do with my theory but I think it’s just another clue George drops about the future connection between Jon and Sansa. The passage concerns the three wild dragons at Dragonstone and here is what it had to say about one of them.

Grey Ghost dwelt in a smoking vent high on the eastern side of the Dragonmont, preferred fish, and was most oft glimpsed flying low over the narrow sea, snatching prey from the waters. A pale grey-white beast the color of morning mist, he was a notably shy dragon who avoided men and their works for years at a time.

The Princess and the Queen

Hmmm! So we have a ghostly almost white dragon who liked to hide from men for years at a time. Sounds a lot like a certain Lord Commander who was hidden by his “father” to protect his dragon identity from the knowledge of certain men. Also, note how Grey Ghost’s color is compared to the morning mist, which of course arrives just as dawn is breaking. And who is the central Night’s Watchman heralded as the bringer of the dawn? Why, it’s that very same Lord Commander who very soon will be as grey as a ghost both literally and figuratively.

Finally, the pièce de résistance—it turns out that the ghostly dragon prefers fish! GRRM is simply a genius at dropping clues. And sometimes I swear he’s got jokes.

I’ve been digging deeper into my theory that Sansa with her Tully fish background along with associations with rivers and the Blackwater is the symbolic golden dragon of the story and I came across a very interesting excerpt from The Princess and the Queen. It doesn’t have anything to do with my theory but I think it’s just another clue George drops about the future connection between Jon and Sansa. summary:
Show
          Chapter
        |
        Archive of Our Own
body:
This Love is Forbidden

Well hot damn, guess what spice has come back? This chapter is longer than I’d thought it be… my head hurts.

But seriously I have to thank @adecila for just being amazing, and being there for me. You to good for this world Alice ❤️❤️❤️

Sneak peak!

Staring at the ceiling of her room they found a comfortable silence that soon took over the room.

“When my mom does this I feel like a charity case.” She mumbled.

Turning over to look at her Jon sighed “Dany, if you’re a charity case, I’m a charity event… it’s okay to have help every once in a while.”

“You’re not a charity event.”

Laughing, Jon said “Well you’re not a charity case.”

Snuggling to his side Jon wrapped an arm around her, and brought her even closer until her head was on his chest. “Thanks Jon.”

“It’s no problem… it’s just me and you, remember?”

Smiling into his chest, she repeated, “Me and you.”

The link!

Show Chapter | Archive of Our Own

summary: A missing character is returning to 'Game of Thrones' for the final season
title: A missing character is returning to 'Game of Thrones' for the final season
description:
After sitting out Season 7, Ghost is returning for the final season. 

He may be needing Valyrian steel dental implants if he’ll be used in the fight against the Army of the Dead.

body:
“He’s not like the others. He never makes a sound. That’s why I named him Ghost. That, and because he’s white. The others are all dark, grey or black.”

“You aren’t like everyone else “

summary: A Howl is Heard, She Wears an Iron Crown - Ambrosia - Game of Thrones (TV) [Archive of Our Own]
title: A Howl is Heard, She Wears an Iron Crown - Ambrosia - Game of Thrones (TV) [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Chapters: 3/6
Fandom: Game of Thrones (TV), A Song of Ice and Fire - George R. R. Martin
Rating: Mature
Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
Relationships: Jon Snow/Sansa Stark
Characters: Jon Snow, Sansa Stark, Arya Stark, Jaime Lannister, Daenerys Targaryen, Gendry Waters, Tyrion Lannister, Ghost (ASoIaF), Bran Stark, Petyr Baelish
Additional Tags: Political Jon, Ghost hates dany, Fake Romance breeds jealous! Jon, Jaime + Sansa friendship, Queen you shall be, Cousin Incest, DID YOU REALLY THINK I WOULDN’T JOIN THIS TRASH CLUB, GET ME A LEATHER JACKET, Mutual Pining
Summary:

“I’m trying to protect you,” Jon grunts, tearing himself away from the window.

But Sansa is there. Sansa is there, against his arm, turning him around. “From what?”

He’s breathing so fast he nearly can’t stop is body from humming, vibrating, he can’t keep his hands still or his eyes at any one place and it’s like it’s under his skin but Sansa just waits, waits, still like stone and the Lady of Winterfell and he isn’t the King-in-the-North-no-longer.

And after a year, a decade, a lifetime, Jon says, brokenly, “From me.”

Sansa does not move. Jon’s beginning to think that the gods could rip apart the ground beneath their feet and separate Westeros into two, east and west, and still Sansa would not move. She looks at him like she can see through him, through the parts he needs to keep from her. “There was once a time when I knew that the last person in Westeros, and Essos, and all the unknown and the dead lands— the last person I needed to be protected from was you.”

Sansa does not move. Jon’s beginning to think that the gods could rip apart the ground beneath their feet and separate Westeros into two, east and west, and still Sansa would not move. She looks at him like she can see through him, through the parts he needs to keep from her. “There was once a time when I knew that the last person in Westeros, and Essos, and all the unknown and the dead lands— the last person I needed to be protected from was you.”

Rating: Mature

Relationships: Jon Snow/Sansa Stark
Characters: Jon Snow, Sansa Stark, Arya Stark, Jaime Lannister, Daenerys Targaryen, Gendry Waters, Tyrion Lannister, Ghost (ASoIaF), Bran Stark, Petyr Baelish
Additional Tags: Political Jon, Ghost hates dany, Fake Romance breeds jealous! Jon, Jaime + Sansa friendship, Queen you shall be, Cousin Incest, DID YOU REALLY THINK I WOULDN’T JOIN THIS TRASH CLUB, GET ME A LEATHER JACKET, Mutual Pining
Summary:

“I’m trying to protect you,” Jon grunts, tearing himself away from the window.

But Sansa is there. Sansa is there, against his arm, turning him around. “From what?”

He’s breathing so fast he nearly can’t stop is body from humming, vibrating, he can’t keep his hands still or his eyes at any one place and it’s like it’s under his skin but Sansa just waits, waits, still like stone and the Lady of Winterfell and he isn’t the King-in-the-North-no-longer.

And after a year, a decade, a lifetime, Jon says, brokenly, “From me.”

Sansa does not move. Jon’s beginning to think that the gods could rip apart the ground beneath their feet and separate Westeros into two, east and west, and still Sansa would not move. She looks at him like she can see through him, through the parts he needs to keep from her. “There was once a time when I knew that the last person in Westeros, and Essos, and all the unknown and the dead lands— the last person I needed to be protected from was you.”

tags: A Song of Ice and Fire
summary:
Jon: So how did you get dragons, anyway?
Daenerys: A fat cheesemonger gave me some rocks that I carried into my first husband's...
body:
Jon: So how did you get dragons, anyway?
Daenerys: A fat cheesemonger gave me some rocks that I carried into my first husband's funeral pyre.
Jon: Ooh, ouch. Sounds painful. And I thought literally getting stabbed in the back by a dozen of my sworn brothers was painful. I can't imagine how much that hurt. Dying sucks, huh?
Daenerys: ... What?
Jon: ... What?

dialogue.name: Jon
dialogue.label: Jon:
dialogue.phrase: So how did you get dragons, anyway?

dialogue.name: Daenerys
dialogue.label: Daenerys:
dialogue.phrase: A fat cheesemonger gave me some rocks that I carried into my first husband's funeral pyre.

dialogue.name: Jon
dialogue.label: Jon:
dialogue.phrase: Ooh, ouch. Sounds painful. And I thought literally getting stabbed in the back by a dozen of my sworn brothers was painful. I can't imagine how much that hurt. Dying sucks, huh?

summary: I'm a HUGE Daenerys fan and I'm also for Jonerys but I don't hate people hoping for Jonsa.  I love Jon and I love Sansa as well!...
body:
I’m a HUGE Daenerys fan and I’m also for Jonerys but I don’t hate people hoping for Jonsa. I love Jon and I love Sansa as well! I just feel like Jon and Daenerys are meant for each other and they’re at least compatible. I understand why they want Sansa to be with Jon because he is one of the best male characters. I want Sansa to have a good, healthy, loving relationship with someone as awesome as Jon but I just don’t see it being Jon. I haven’t read the books but I don’t see them happening on the show at all. Season 7 showed us that even though they love each other (as siblings) they don’t work well together and that wouldn’t make for a very healthy relationship for obvious reasons.

I also don’t see why everyone feels the need to love one awesome womxn and hate on another. Daenerys is my number one, even though she wasn’t in season 1 (I couldn’t identify because of her “love” with Drogo because I was her age while watching and just couldn’t understand loving your rapist for any reason), Arya was. I came to love her during season 2 and Arya became my number 2. Jon as King of the North made me dislike him in much of season 7 and Sansa took his place at my number 3 and he is now number 4. I love them all for different reasons and I only have traits I dislike but I don’t bash characters over it. I’m not anti Sansa at all, even though she was a brat for most of season 1.

I feel like the theory of Daenerys becoming the “Mad Queen” is BS too. I mean, if she were gonna lose it she would have after being abused by her brother, living a terrible life in exile while constantly running from assassins, being raped by Drogo for so long AND having to deal with all the men and their misogyny. I wouldn’t even call Cersei a mad queen! She’s just fed up with everything and everyone but reacted badly to it. She didn’t have a great life either but that is no excuse for the things she’s done!

I feel that Jonerys is endgame based on everything I’ve read online and seen in the show. I’ve read Jonsa theories but I don’t see what they do, I guess. Everything seems related to sibling love rather than romantic love.

I also don’t see why people are grossed out by Jon and Daenerys being realted. They’re in a time and world where 1st cousins marry and reproduce to protect family names due to patriarchal bloodlines (which would have never been a problem if womxn were allowed to keep their names. Plus, it just makes more sense to trace children through mothers! You don’t need proof to know it’s her baby, after all!) so Jon and Daenerys being together shouldn’t be a problem. I’m not even grossed out by Cersei and Jaime since they’re both consenting! Even their parents were cousins.

Another thing is Jon’s claim to the throne. His isn’t actually stronger than that of Daenerys. When Rhaegar was killed, the Mad King named Viserys his heir which means that the line of succession skips over any of Rhaegar’s children. Viserys named Daenerys his heir and he was killed (and rightfully so, even though I felt it was too slow) and Daenerys is still alive so her claim is the strongest. If she died THEN Jon’s would be the strongest and only rightful claim. But, like I said, Daenerys is still alive.

Anyways, I hope Jon and Daenerys get married and have a baby (I hope they have a daughter and rid of that patriarchal line of succession). I would rather Jon just be an adviser or whatever rather than being king. I just want my girl to rule without a man, because she just does her best that way! And I want to see Ghost and Daenerys create a sweet bond!

And, for a kind of random last thought, I want to try all of the Game of Thrones themed beer. But, I live in America where there are so many different ages of adulthood! “Legal” adult at 18, can’t buy tobacco till 19 (in my state at least) and can’t buy liquor until 21. I can’t even sign a contract until I’m 19 in my state due to the age of majority thing this crazy country has going on! I’m nearly 18 so I’m getting somewhere but, that doesn’t stop me from fantasizing about moving to London!

Well, anyways, I’ll wrap up my rant now. Goodnight/day to everyone!

I mean, if she were gonna lose it she would have after being abused by her brother, living a terrible life in exile while constantly running from assassins, being raped by Drogo for so long AND having to deal with all the men and their misogyny. I also don’t see why people are grossed out by Jon and Daenerys being realted. They’re in a time and world where 1st cousins marry and reproduce to protect family names due to patriarchal bloodlines (which would have never been a problem if womxn were allowed to keep their names. Plus, it just makes more sense to trace children through mothers! You don’t need proof to know it’s her baby, after all!) so Jon and Daenerys being together shouldn’t be a problem. If she died THEN Jon’s would be the strongest and only rightful claim. But, like I said, Daenerys is still alive.

I would rather Jon just be an adviser or whatever rather than being king. I just want my girl to rule without a man, because she just does her best that way! And, for a kind of random last thought, I want to try all of the Game of Thrones themed beer. But, I live in America where there are so many different ages of adulthood! “Legal” adult at 18, can’t buy tobacco till 19 (in my state at least) and can’t buy liquor until 21. Well, anyways, I’ll wrap up my rant now. Goodnight/day to everyone!

tags: a song of ice and fire
summary: Sent To Me - toaquiprashippar - Game of Thrones (TV) [Archive of Our Own]
title: Sent To Me - toaquiprashippar - Game of Thrones (TV) [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Chapters: 5/?
Fandom: Game of Thrones (TV), A Song of Ice and Fire - George R. R. Martin, A Song of Ice and Fire & Related Fandoms
Rating: Mature
Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
Relationships: Jon Snow/Daenerys Targaryen, Lyanna Stark/Rhaegar Targaryen
Characters: Daenerys Targaryen, Rhaegar Targaryen, Jon Snow, Ned Stark, Robb Stark, Arya Stark, Sansa Stark, Rickon Stark, Catelyn Tully Stark, Arthur Dayne, Oswell Whent, Lyanna Stark
Additional Tags: I’ll give you more character tags if I continue this, Canon Divergence - Robert’s Rebellion, What Could Have Been, Rhaegar Lives, R plus L equals J, Alternate Universe - Canon Divergence
Summary:

He found a reason to live before he could let death claim him.
What he did not know was of the other reasons that could be found across the Narrow Sea.

CHAPTER 5

As Jon and Daenerys learn more of each other, Ned finds that there is much he does not know.Tywin plays his move, as fire and ice collide.

I can’t believe I’m finally updating this beauty! Yup, all thanks to @fairytalelovr, who had to listen to my whining all these days, being the cutest little bean that she is and always making me feel better, be it with talks or just writing little pieces of her fics I adore or just something to cheer me up, she’s my superhero! AND ALSO, @tomakeitbeautifultolive who not only beta’d it but made sure I believed this chapter didn’t suck, and also @ktwrites keeping my spirits up when I was most definetely down! Thanks girls, I owe you so much! <3

SO EXCITED, believe it or not, it was all “written” with dictation, it was a bitch to write, took me twice the time, but the feeling of finishing this chapter? So worth it! <3 
Can’t wait to read your opinions on it! :)
